feed.title: DAVx⁵ Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for DAVx⁵: v4.3.15-ose
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Rewrite WebdavMountsActivity to Compose by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/607
  • Rewrite AccountActivity to Compose by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/617
  • Rewrite PermissionsActivity, PermissionsFragment to Compose by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/583
  • Rewrite intro pages to Compose (dropping all Fragments) by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/626
  • Rewrite AddWebdavMountActivity to Compose by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/630
  • Rewrite app settings to Compose by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/628
  • Improve homepage URL launching by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/632
  • Make LinearProgressIndicators orange by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/636
  • Refactor Tasks app detection (and settings update when tasks apps change) by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/637
  • Rewrite WifiPermissionsActivity to Compose by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/640
  • Rewrite navigation drawer to Compose by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/644
  • Rewrite AccountSettingsActivity to Compose by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/646
  • Periodic workers directly run sync by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/648
  • Better handling of tasks app changes by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/652

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/compare/v4.3.14-ose...v4.3.15-ose

entry.title: New release for DAVx⁵: v4.3.16-ose
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Rewrite CreateCalendarActivity to Compose by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/645
  • Provide a widget option by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/643
  • Remove unused string resources by @mbiebl in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/651
  • Don't use Gradle build and configuration cache for releases by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/662
  • Replaced icons with auto-mirrored version when possible by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/666
  • Upgraded ical4android by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/663
  • Do not show extended proxy details in App Settings if proxy type is s… by @mbiebl in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/661
  • Rewrite login activity to Compose by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/672
  • Show Pending state in AccountsActivity, too; remove obsolete code by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/680
  • OpenSourcePage: make "dontShow" LiveData by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/683
  • Create a native Material theme and get rid of XML styles by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/675
  • Update copyright; upgrade dependencies by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/687
  • SettingsLiveData: post initial value even when it's null by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/686
  • Do not show existing password on password change by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/689
  • DeleteCollectionDialog: handle case that result may contain null value by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/697
  • Create account: user feedback when account name is already taken by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/701
  • Nextcloud Login Flow: improved handling of back by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/712
  • Detect WebDAV-Push support by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/716
  • SettingsManager: use Flows instead of LiveData by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/714
  • Check if keep-permissions changed when user comes back from settings app by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/715
  • Use broadcastReceiverFlow instead of BroadcastReceivers by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/722
  • TasksActivity: use defaultValue=true for HINT_OPENTASKS_NOT_INSTALLED by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/723
  • Add non-Compose colorBackground for AppIntro by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/724
  • Use LocalContentColor for ClickableTextWithLink by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/725
  • Always use provider.use to automatically close ContentProviderClients by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/726
  • Minor broadcast receiver optimizations by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/729
  • Adjusted paddings by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/707

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/compare/v4.3.15-ose...v4.3.16-ose

entry.title: New release for DAVx⁵: v4.3.16.1-ose
entry.content: Full Changelog: https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/compare/v4.3.16-ose...v4.3.16.1-ose

entry.title: New release for DAVx⁵: v4.4-ose
entry.content:
What's Changed

New features

  • Rewrite DebugInfoActivity to M3 by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/744
  • Rewrite WifiPermissionsActivity to M3 by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/791
  • Fix padding for show only personal by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/807

Bug fixes

  • RefreshCollectionsWorker causes app to crash when the service is invalid by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/743
  • AccountsScreen: move navigation drawer to foreground so that it overlays FABs when open by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/765
  • Pre-select per-contact categories for login type NextcloudLogin by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/774
  • Start at LoginDetails page if logging in via intent by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/772
  • Fix widget colors by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/799
  • Fix setup through nextcloud app (intent) not working by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/782
  • Fix last sync time not being set for address books (closes #810) by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/812
  • MKCALENDAR: wrap supported components in <CALDAV:supported-calendar-co… by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/816

Refactoring

  • Add M3 theme and apply to AboutActivity by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/731
  • WebDAV Mounts UI: M3, refactoring by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/736
  • Rewrite AccountsActivity to M3 by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/749
  • Rewrite AccountActivity to M3 by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/752
  • Rewrite RenameAccountDialog to M3 by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/768
  • Rewrite WelcomePage to M3 by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/754
  • Switched CalDAV and CardDAV tab positions by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/769
  • Replace DavUtils.lastSegmentOfUrl by UrlUtils.lastSegment by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/767
  • Use hiltViewModel for creating ViewModels with parameters in new Screen architecture by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/776
  • Rewrite PermissionsIntroPage to M3 by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/758
  • Intro pages: use Hilt for dependency injection by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/779
  • Don't listen for account changes all the time by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/780
  • Rewrite TasksIntroPage to M3 by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/760
  • Inject SyncDispatcher over Hilt by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/784
  • Rewrite BatteryOptimizationsPage to M3 by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/747
  • Added M3 theme to intro pages by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/756
  • Rewrite AppSettingsActivity to M3 by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/792
  • M3 tweaks by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/796
  • Rewrite AccountSettingsActivity to M3 by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/795
  • Drop M2 (everything is M3 now) by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/797
  • Orange progress indicator bar by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/803
  • Increased icon size and text size for accounts list by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/813
  • Last M3 Tweaks by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/817

Other changes

  • Rewrite OpenSourcePage to M3 by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/755
  • Fix login detail pages loosing user changes on rotation / re-creation (closes #775) by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/778
  • AccountSettingsActivity: make canAccessWifiSsid live-capable by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/732
  • Log last sync time per collection service and URL by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/702
  • More DI using Hilt by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/789
  • Fix color picker size by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/808

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/compare/v4.3.16.1-ose...v4.4-ose

entry.title: New release for DAVx⁵: v4.4.0.1-ose
entry.content:
What's Changed

Bug fixes

  • PreferenceRepository.observeAsFlow: emit initial value by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/822
  • App settings: mention that verbose logs can be viewed in debug info by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/824

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/compare/v4.4-ose...v4.4.0.1-ose
